name: Imp PRF
query:
select
m.workflow_state as "Workflow State::100",
m.name as "ID::200",
m.title as "Title::300",
m.material_request_type as "Purpose::100",
m.purchase_from as "Purchase From::100",
m.purchase_for as "Purchase For::100",
m.status as "Status::100",
m.schedule_date as "Required By::100",
m.company as "Company::100",
m.per_ordered as "Percent Ordered::100",
m.per_received as "Percent Received::100",
m.set_warehouse as "Set Targer Warehouse::200",
m.transfer_status as "Transfer Status::100",
mri.item_code as "Item Code::200",
mri.item_name as "Item Name::200",
poi.parent as "Purchase Order Number::200",
poi.qty as "Quantity::100",
po.workflow_state as "PO Status",
rqi.parent as "Request For Quotation Number",
rq.status as "RFQ Status::200"
from `tabMaterial Request` m 
left join `tabMaterial Request Item` mri
on mri.parent = m.name
left join `tabPurchase Order Item` poi 
on poi.material_request = m.name
left join `tabRequest for Quotation Item` rqi
on rqi.material_request = m.name
left join `tabRequest for Quotation` rq
on rqi.parent = rq.name
left join `tabPurchase Order` po
on poi.parent = po.name
where m.docstatus = 1 and m.per_received != 100.000 
and m.status != "Stopped" and m.transaction_date >= %(from_date)s and m.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s
and m.purchase_from = %(purchase_from)s and m.company = %(company)s;
